AD_ERROR:
An error occurred during processing. It will be played without applying the Alter Dresser.
Avatar
ADEPDescription: Sets the effect when using the Enhanced Switch.
ADSSDescription: Switch objects without using animation effects.
ADMIDescription: Set the AlterDresserSwitch you want to enable with this menu.
ADMGDescription: Registers child MenuItems as submenus. Up to 8, any more will be disabled.
ADAODescription: An option that can only be used in projects where AvatarOptimizer has been introduced.
ADSE_ERR_NoMat: A valid Material-set SkinnedMeshRenderer is required in the child.
ADSE_ERR_Child: May not function correctly when nesting AlterDresser Enhanced.
ADSS_MSG_NoSettings: There are no items to set on this component.
ADSB_MSG_NoSettings: There are no items to set on this component.
ADMG_PF_MenuIcon_ToolTip: It is the icon displayed on the ExMenu.
ADMG_PF_MenuName_ToolTip: This is the name displayed on the ExMenu. The name of the game object is used.
ADMG_PF_Exclusive_ToolTip: Manages child menus as an exclusive group (a group that cannot be enabled at the same time).
ADMG_PF_InitValue_ToolTip: Selects the menu that is enabled first when the avatar is loaded.
ADMG_MSG_ParentExclusive: Cannot change settings because the parent group is set to exclusive.
ADMI_PF_MenuIcon_ToolTip: It is the icon displayed on the ExMenu.
ADMI_PF_MenuName_ToolTip: This is the name displayed on the ExMenu. The name of the game object is used.
ADMI_PF_InitValue_ToolTip: Selects the menu that is enabled first when the avatar is loaded.
ADSB_AO_ListTitle: Used Blendshape (Those without checks will be fixed at the current value.)
ADSE_AO_DoMerge_Tips: Generates Merge Skinned Mesh during build.
ADSE_AO_UNITY_WARNING: If the number of materials after the combination is more than five and you are using the "Automatic Generation" or "Manual Assignment" of materials, you may not be able to correctly assign the materials due to a known issue in Unity 2019.
ADSE_AO_MA_ERROR: When combining meshes that include MA Blendshape Sync, an error is reported stating that the mesh does not exist in the MergedMesh renderer from ModularAvatar. However, this is by design.
